name: Joink
description:
You play as two characters. Your goal is to reach the purple platform with both characters in each level. You can control one at a time. Pressing (and holding) shift will attach the two characters with an elastic rope and shoot one of the characters towards the other. You can then play as the other character. Don't fall and don't get hit. Thank you for playing!

Controls: 

wasd to move

hold shift to swap  and slingshot (you'll probably see)

press q to die cuz why not

This game was made by a group of 3 friends, or 4 if you count the one who helped with the music for a bit.
